movie.title: 14 Blades
movie.writer: Daniel Lee (screenplay), Abe Kwong (screenplay), Tin Shu Mak (screenplay), Ho Leung Lau (screenplay), Daniel Lee (original story), Siu Cheung Chan
movie.actors: Donnie Yen, Wei Zhao, Chun Wu, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
movie.plot: A kung fu thriller set during the Ming Dynasty and centered on a secret service agent (Donnie Yen) in the emperor's court who is betrayed and then hunted by his colleagues.
